TestCase.TestCaseTitle: All Message Elements within the Schema for Package Unit.
TestCase.TestCaseObjective: BSO validation. Test whether the Producer/Provider is able to create the correct MIP data for at least the mandatory elements of every Message Element listed under IDT Schemas > IESUnits.xsd, and the Consumers are able to correctly understand (and display) them.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: The Producer creates message elements for all possible Units with at least all their mandatory Elements. The Consumers receive the data and process them.
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: R/R, P/S.
TestCase.TestCasePreCondition: The Producer/Provider has created the 'Ground Picture > Forces' topic. The Consumers have subscribed to this topic.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: This test is considered a success if all possible Units, along with their mandatory elements are processed and interpreted correctly on all Nations' C2IS.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction:
The Producer creates the Unit with name XXX_AU_057 and fills, at least, ALL its mandatory elements.
Notices: XXX in name of the object is meant (in principle) to be replaced by the 3 letter code of the country name. Example for the name of the Unit: ITA_AU_057
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Consumers receive and process (and display) the Unit created and all elements that the Producer created.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: The Producer creates an update for the object by changing ALL mandatory elements.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Consumers receive and process (and display) the created Unit and all elements that the Producer created.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Repeat steps 1 and 2 for every Message Element listed under IDT Schemas > IESUnits.xsd (from AdministrativeUnit to WaterSupplyUnit)
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: See steps 1 and 2 for every Unit Message Element.
